input: Parallel hybrids have [MASK] discrete power systems, gas and electric.
Insomnia is defined as trouble falling asleep or staying asleep and affects one in [MASK] adults.
Scorpions have [MASK] legs and a pair of lobster-like pinchers and a tail that curves up.
Right lung has three lobes, left lung has [MASK] lobes.
Atlantic salmon spend between one and [MASK] years at sea.
Depression ranks among the top [MASK] workplace problems following only family crisis and stress.
Water is the only substance on earth found naturally in [MASK] forms - solid, liquid, and gas.
